body.name: Amazon Basics 3-Piece Non-Stick Frying Pan Set - 8 Inch, 10 Inch & 12 Inch, Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 3-piece cookware set includes an 8-inch, 10-inch, and 12-inch fry pan
Nonstick coating for easy cooking and cleaning; BPA-free
Soft-touch handles stay comfortably cool during use
Spiral bottom heats evenly; compatible with all cooktops, except for induction
Note: For nonstick longevity, best used on low to medium heat; please check size of stovetop before purchasing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The sleek black design adds a modern touch .
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Amazon Basics Non-Stick Cookware 15-Piece Set as a gift, and it has exceeded my expectations. The sleek black design adds a modern touch to any kitchen, making it not just practical but aesthetically pleasing.The variety in the set is impressive – from pots and pans to utensils, it covers all the essentials for cooking. The non-stick coating has proven to be a game-changer, ensuring easy food release and a hassle-free cleaning process. It's a relief to cook without worrying about stubborn residue sticking to the cookware.The construction feels durable and well-made, offering even heat distribution during cooking. The comfortable handles provide a secure grip, and the lids fit snugly, helping to lock in flavors and nutrients.What makes this set stand out is its affordability without compromising on quality. It's an excellent option for those looking for reliable cookware on a budget. The inclusion of utensils in the set is a thoughtful touch, saving the hassle of separately sourcing kitchen tools.Overall, the Amazon Basics Non-Stick Cookware 15-Piece Set makes for a practical and stylish gift for anyone setting up their kitchen or looking to upgrade their cookware collection. It's a versatile, user-friendly set that combines functionality with an attractive design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Budget Cookware, Great Value
reviews.reviewText: Time to get new cookware and this set more than exceeded my expectations. Love these pans. Arrived carefully boxed within another box. Everything packed so securely that nothing was damaged. Within a day, I was eager to make some fresh, homemade stovetop popcorn on my gas stove, using one of the glass lid pans. It was easy to shake the pan with the sturdy cool grip handle, watch the popcorn cooking inside the pot and know exactly when it was ready. Perfect. Nothing burned. Easy to handwash clean. Consider this to be my best budget cookware purchase for value, design, and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and decent
reviews.reviewText: Decent, great starter set.They won’t last forever if you’re cooking almost every meal, and the heat distribution isn’t even all the way around often, but it’s workable and the food comes out great in the end.Hand-washing will greatly extend the life of the pots and pans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Non stick, easy to clean, overall great product especially for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for 1st moving out. Works as needed and not expensive at all compared to other sets. Has everything you need for a beginner, and one that isn't feeding many either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't expecting the quality I received in these pans. They are wonderful! Great quality for the price. If you're on the fence about giving them a try, make the purchase. You won't regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: I've only had these pots and pans for a week, and have used them everyday. I'm already noticing that the handles and the top of the knobs on top of the lids are becoming lose. I realize these are not a very expensive set but I'm disappointed already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I'm not really a cookware expert, nor do I play one on TV. I'm not even into cooking at all actually. To be honest, I hate cooking. Well, I don't really hate it. But I don't like it. What I do like is when a product I buy on Amazon exceeds my wildest expectations. Not that my expectations for this cookware set were all that wild. Rather tame actually, considering my general aversion to cooking in general. I like to boil water (and I'm an expert at that, although I don't like to brag), maybe for a cup of instant ramen noodles or a cup of coffee, and once in awhile, if I'm feeling particularly adventurous and/or frisky, some mac-and-cheese or some stove-top stuffing. But I'd usually much rather open a bag of something (beef jerky and cheez-its?) than go near the stove. So maybe it was just lowered expectaions when I ordered this basic package after throwing away all my old stuff following a recent move cross country. I was looking for something practical and of some halfway decent quality at least, but I certainly didn't want anything too fancy, nor did I want to spend too much on things I didn't think I'd be using all that much anyway. However, after having had and used this set for some time now, I must say I am most impressed. Not downright giddy mind you, but impressed. I can't talk of cookware going for a lot more than this, but I'm not sure buying such would be worth the extra money anyway because these are simply great. Very solid and well put together, heat absorption and duration are excellent and the heavy glass lids add a lot to the general overall feeling of quality here. The non-stick surfaces are great and fairly scratch-resistant as well and cleaning is a breeze. As someone who does not like cooking, I find myself using these all the time now, and cooking up a lot of variety of recipes (a lot of my own creation) I never thought I'd try. Don't let the price fool you, and don't let any negative reviews dissuade you. If you're looking for a nice little quality cookware set, at a more than reasonable price, don't hesitate to buy. The big two-handled pot is my favorite and especially great for my new specialty. A big pot of "Tommy's world famous, bacon, beef, and onions, honey bourbon barbequed beans," of course... ;-P

This cookware set is a game-changer for any college student like me! It's affordable, yet it doesn't compromise on quality. The non-stick coating works like a charm, making cooking and cleaning a breeze, which is perfect for those busy days of studying and classes. The set includes a variety of pots and pans that are just the right sizes for cooking meals for one or a small group. Plus, the handles stay cool, so there's no need to worry about burning your hands. If you're looking for a reliable and budget-friendly cookware set for your college kitchen, the Amazon Basics 8-Piece Non-Stick Kitchen Cookware Set is a great choice!

these pans are light weight , very easy to clean , inexpensive . I cook most things on medium to low heat and they haven't let me down yet . Comes with three different sizes so fits all my needs .. If they only last a few years will be all good as they were priced right . Good buy for me !! I still have my pan for the oven so I'm all set nowWorth it for sure

Das Topfset wurde für den Camper angeschafft, es ist leicht und somit perfekt. Durch die Beschichtung ist das reinigen ebenfalls ein Kinderspiel, kein schrubben nötig, Schwamm reicht völlig aus. Die beigelieferten Pfannenwender usw. Sind den Aufpreis echt wert und sollten mitbestellt werden. Ich kann das Set nur empfehlen.Auch perfekt als Starter-Kit für die erste Wohnung.
Un très bon rapport qualité prix. La batterie est assez complète pour cuisiner tout ce qu’on souhaite. C’est parfait pour une première installation ☺️
